subject: INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND (I
body:
INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND (IMF).
World Debt Reconciliation Agencies.
1900 Pennsylvania Ave NW,
Washington, DC 20431, USA
United States of America.
Attention!! Attention!!
This is to inform you that this Agency (International Monetary Fund (IMF) has been instructed by the World Bank in collaboration with the United Nations/ Regions Bank, to carry out the release of every long withholding inheritance benefits such as listed below:
i.   Unclaimed Inheritance funds.
ii.  Unclaimed Retirement Benefits
iii. Unclaimed lottery prize.
iii. Unclaimed Consignment/Packages.
iv. Unclaimed Compensation funds.
v.  Unclaimed Inheritance documents and its certificates.
This INSTRUCTIONS was carried out after the above-mentioned Agency has taken time to study your payment file and found out that you have paid VIRTUALLY fees and certificate but the fund has not been released to you.
The most annoying thing is that they cannot tell you the truth that on a known account will they ever release the fund to you or refund; instead they let you spend money unnecessarily. Now we have been ordered by the above mentioned Agency to have your fund release to you through online system of Banking. For further inquiries, contact us directly on the E-mail address
Regards,
Mrs. Kristalian Georgieva
Chief Information Officer
Director of the Information Technology Department
International Monetary Fund (IMF).
United States of America.

subject: Re: INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND (I
body:
Hello Mrs. Kristalian Georgieva,

Thank you for reaching out and providing such detailed information. It's quite interesting to learn about these unclaimed benefits and funds. I must admit, I wasn't aware of such things before.

Could you please elaborate more on how this process works? How does the Monetary Fund IMF identify individuals who have these unclaimed benefits? And what is the procedure to claim them?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Kelly

subject: Re: INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND (I
body:
1.Cash delivery is to deliver your the money to your home address it will
cost you $1600

2. Bank to bank transfer is to transfer your fund into your account which
charges is $900

3. Through bitcoin is to transfer the total funds through coin into your
wallet that is if you have bitcoin address  the charges is $1100

body:

I appreciate your help in understanding these processes better!

Kelly
